abstract: Witnesses in Cairo on Sunday claimed in accounts posted on social media Web sites that the military had used excessive force, fired live ammunition at the protesters and drove armored personnel carriers into the crowds.
snippet: Witnesses in Cairo on Sunday claimed in accounts posted on social media Web sites that the military had used excessive force, fired live ammunition at the protesters and drove armored personnel carriers into the crowds.

headline.main: Social Media Accounts of Violence in Cairo Challenge Official Narrative
